snippet: The Chinese defeated the Americans, 101.5 to 48.5, at a showdown this month in Ningbo, China.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column on even in Ningbo, China.
lead_paragraph: The Chinese defeated the Americans, 101.5 to 48.5, at a showdown this month in Ningbo, China.

headline.main: Pair’s Efforts Can’t Save U.S. From a Drubbing
headline.print_headline: Pair’s Efforts Can’t Save U.S. From a Drubbing
